snippet: Ronaldo scored all three goals in a win over Wolfsburg that overturned last week’s unexpected defeat and put Madrid in the Champions League semifinals for the sixth consecutive year.
abstract: Real Madrid beats Wolfsburg, 3-0, to advance to UEFA Champions League semifinals.
lead_paragraph: Ronaldo scored all three goals in a win over Wolfsburg that overturned last week’s unexpected defeat and put Madrid in the Champions League semifinals for the sixth consecutive year.

headline.main: Cristiano Ronaldo Pulls Real Madrid Back From the Brink
headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Pulls Real Madrid Back From the Brink
